data.actual_result: You don't see the mini profile although you can sense the vibration which indicates it's not intended (keep phone to general profile mode to sense the vibration)
data.expected_result: You should see the mini profile of the user popup
data.short_description: Clicking and holding on users who are in vc doesn't bring up the user's profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any voice channel (no need to connect) - Click hold on any user
